meanings.definition: A waxy substance found in the cell walls of cork cells.
meanings.sent1: The suberin in cork cells gives them a protective coating.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study suberin to understand how it helps plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook suberin for a tasty treat!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like suberin, sealing off any further discussion.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, suberin looks like a tiny fortress around the cells.

meanings.definition: A waterproof substance that helps protect plants from water loss.
meanings.sent1: The suberin coating on leaves prevents water from escaping.
meanings.sent2: Farmers appreciate the role of suberin in plant survival.
meanings.sent3: The raindrops danced on the suberin-covered leaves.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as the suberin shield around plants.
meanings.sent5: In the desert, suberin is like a precious shield against dehydration.
